features.name: Sistema de Autenticación
features.description: Pruebas completas del sistema de login con capturas por step

steps.name: Given I navigate to login page
When I fill email field with valid credentials
And I fill password field with valid credentials
And I click on Login Button
Then I should see Welcome message

screenshots.description: Vista general del dashboard después del login

scenarios.name: Login fallido con credenciales inválidas

steps.name: Given I navigate to login page
When I fill email with invalid credentials
And I click on Login Button
Then I should see error message

screenshots.description: Pantalla completa mostrando el error de login

scenarios.error_message: Validación de mensaje de error falló

features.name: Carrito de Compras
features.description: Funcionalidad del carrito con capturas en pasos importantes

steps.name: Given I navigate to product page
When I select quantity 2
And I click Add to Cart button
Then product should be added to cart
Given I have products in cart
When I change quantity to 5
And I click Update button
Then total should be recalculated
steps.error_message: Total not updated: Expected $250.00 but got $200.00

screenshots.description: Vista completa del carrito con error de cálculo

features.name: Navegación del Sistema
features.description: Pruebas de navegación con capturas en verificaciones

steps.name: Given I am on homepage
When I hover over Products menu
And I click on Electronics
Then I should see products grid
Given I am on homepage
When I search for "laptop"
Then I should see search results
